remarks:
Deduction form of ~ rexlimd .  (Contributed by NM, 27-May-1998.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 30-May-2011.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 14-Jan-2020.) 

---

 Deduction from Theorem 19.23 of [Margaris] p. 90 (restricted quantifier version).  (Contributed by NM, 27-May-1998.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 30-May-2011.)
statement:
rexlimd.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
rexlimd.2 $e |- F/ x ch $.
rexlimd.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A -> ( ps -> ch ) ) ) $.
rexlimd $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x e. A ps -> ch ) ) $.
